beam_coordinate_system_3d.png.description: 3D coordinate system diagram showing beam cross-section with x, y, z axes and circular cross-section element

timoshenko_beam_planar_geometry.png.description: Planar beam diagram showing beam axis along x-direction with z-axis perpendicular, illustrating Timoshenko beam model geometry

beam_deformation_displacement_field.png.description: Beam deformation diagrams showing axial and bending displacement components before and after deformation with displacement vectors and rotation angles

beam_generalized_displacements.png.description: Simple beam diagram showing generalized displacement parameters along beam axis

beam_section_shearing_deformation.png.description: Beam section rotation diagram showing shearing deformation with rotation angle and displacement components

beam_element_distributed_concentrated_lo.description: Beam element with distributed loads and concentrated forces showing internal forces, moments, and shear forces along beam length

infinitesimal_beam_element_equilibrium.p.description: Infinitesimal beam element showing internal forces and moments with equilibrium conditions

volume_force_distribution_comparison.png.description: Comparison diagrams showing volume force distribution on beam cross-sections for different loading cases

axial_stress_distribution_decomposition..description: Beam cross-section diagrams showing axial stress distribution decomposed into constant and linear components

beam_boundary_conditions_examples.png.description: Multiple beam boundary condition diagrams showing free-free, fixed-free, fixed-fixed, and simply-supported configurations with forces and moments

clamped_simply_supported_beam.png.description: Clamped-simply-supported beam diagram with end moment

beam_3d_stress_state_coordinates.png.description: 3D beam coordinate system showing stress state with coordinate axes

euler_bernoulli_beam_section_rotation.pn.description: Euler-Bernoulli beam model diagram showing section rotation and bending displacement with geometric relationships

infinitesimal_beam_bending_displacement..description: Infinitesimal beam element showing bending displacement and rotation of generic point with geometric details

timoshenko_euler_bernoulli_comparison.pn.description: Comparison of Timoshenko and Euler-Bernoulli beam models showing shearing deformation angles

beam_distributed_shearing_load.png.description: Beam subjected to distributed shearing load and end concentrated forces with moment diagram

beam_element_shear_moment_equilibrium.pn.description: Infinitesimal beam element showing internal shear force and moment equilibrium

euler_bernoulli_boundary_conditions.png.description: Boundary condition examples for Euler-Bernoulli beam showing clamped-free and clamped-simply-supported configurations
